courses.name: Muay Thai Kickboxing
courses.description: Learn the art of Muay Thai, 'the art of eight limbs.' This striking-based martial art uses punches, elbows, knees, and shins for powerful self-defense and fitness improvement.

courses.name: Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu (BJJ)
courses.description: Develop grappling skills and ground fighting techniques in this submission-oriented martial art. BJJ emphasizes control and leverage, making it effective regardless of size or strength.

courses.name: Boxing Fundamentals
courses.description: Master the art of boxing with a focus on proper footwork, punching technique, and defense. This course is perfect for beginners looking to build a strong foundation in boxing.

courses.name: Kids Martial Arts (Ages 5-12)
courses.description: Introduce children to the world of martial arts in a fun and safe environment. This program focuses on building coordination, discipline, and self-confidence through age-appropriate drills and games.

courses.name: Kickboxing Cardio Blast (**NEW!**)
courses.description: Get your heart pumping with this high-energy kickboxing workout. Burn calories, improve coordination, and have a blast all at once!

courses.name: Women's Self-Defense Workshop
courses.description: Empower yourself with essential self-defense techniques in this practical workshop. Learn basic strikes, escapes, and situational awareness to stay safe.

courses.name: Private Training
courses.description: Take your training to the next level with one-on-one instruction from our experienced coaches. Customize your workout and achieve your fitness goals faster.
